component.name: MovieData
component.script: sub setFields() datum = m.top.full_data m.top.title = datum.name m.top.movieID = datum.id if datum.posterURL <> invalid m.top.posterURL = datum.posterURL else m.top.posterURL = "" end if m.top.description = datum.overview m.top.favorite = datum.UserData.isFavorite m.top.watched = datum.UserData.played end sub
